Pre-Game Insights: Die Mannschaft claimed a 4-2 victory over Greece in the quarter-finals of Euro 2012.
Julian Nagelsmann has won three, drawn two, and lost two of his first seven games since replacing Hansi Flick.
Die Mannschaft claimed impressive victories over France and the Netherlands in March.
Germany lacks a cutting edge in the final third, firing just five of their 27 shots on target in their last match.
Germany will be keen to make a swift return to winning ways against Greece.
Germany have beaten Greece in six of their previous nine meetings, scoring at least twice on all six occasions.
Greece are gearing up for their first fixture since March when they were eliminated from Euro 2024 qualifying.
Greece have lost and not scored in three of their last four away games.
